price: And Zachariah, John, Jesus, and Elias – each was among the righteous.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحۡيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلۡيَاسَۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā wayaḥyā waʿīsā wa-il'yāsa kullun mina al-ṣāliḥīna
